custom_nodes.description: Sidebar browser for SWORKS_TEAM LoRAs from Civitai. Browse, download, and apply LoRAs with image previews and tag filtering.

custom_nodes.author: NineKey1028
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Dynamic_TagLoader
custom_nodes.description: Automation toolkit for ComfyUI featuring dynamic tag combinations, LoRA parsing, and workflow metadata reading.

custom_nodes.author: dennisvink
custom_nodes.title: Outline Alpha Snap Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This node adds an outside-only outline around the opaque region of an image while cleaning up semi‑transparent edge pixels and removing stray islands.

custom_nodes.author: Moser9815
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RMAutomation
custom_nodes.description: Automation nodes for ComfyUI: RM Styles (load prompts from JSON with random/increment modes), Power LoRA Loader (advanced LoRA loading with random weights), image fallback, mask gate, latent operations, and video combine nodes.

custom_nodes.author: maartenharms
custom_nodes.title: PromptFlow
custom_nodes.description: Modular prompt engineering with wildcards, variations preview, auto-sort, and presets. Two modes (Simple/Extended), LoRA Manager integration, and 7 themes shared with FlowPath.

custom_nodes.author: maartenharms
custom_nodes.title: FlowPath
custom_nodes.description: Intelligent path organization for ComfyUI. Drag-drop segments, auto-detection (Model, LoRA, Resolution, Seed), template variables, global presets, dual outputs for Image Saver, and 7 beautiful themes. Say goodbye to messy output folders!

custom_nodes.author: HappyOnigiri
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Meld
custom_nodes.description: The ultimate Image Manager & Gallery for ComfyUI. Automatically catalog generations, track lineage, and restore workflows with a single click.

custom_nodes.author: robomello
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Saver
custom_nodes.description: Saves images with prompt reference cards - thumbnail + formatted prompt side-by-side with JSON syntax highlighting for easy browsing and organization.

custom_nodes.title: Fibo Edit Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for BriaAI Fibo Edit image model.

custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI Custom Node to backup workflows and their required models locally.

custom_nodes.author: DVA

custom_nodes.author: FearL0rd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ParallelAnything
custom_nodes.description: This suite of nodes unlocks high-performance parallel processing in ComfyUI by utilizing **Model Replication**. Unlike standard offloading which moves a single model instance between devices, these nodes create independent replicas of the model on each selected GPU/CPU, allowing for true simultaneous batch processing.

custom_nodes.author: kaushiknishchay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen3-ASR
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for Qwen3-ASR (0.6B/1.7B) and ForcedAligner. Supports high-accuracy ASR and language identification for 52 languages/dialects, including 22 Chinese dialects and various English accents. Features word-level timestamps, long audio transcription, and VRAM-optimized inference.

custom_nodes.author: SparknightLLC
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MakeSeamlessTexture
custom_nodes.description: Turn images into seamless textures and build tiled previews. Unique radial mask method available.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab

custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI custom node pack for Qwen3-ASR, providing simple speech‑to‑text workflows with local model caching and optional timestamp output. Supports Qwen/Qwen3‑ASR‑1.7B and 0.6B, with HuggingFace/ModelScope download options and clean integration for ComfyUI pipelines.

custom_nodes.description: Minimal OpenAI API nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: bkpaine1

custom_nodes.description: AMD ROCm bf16 diagnostic tools for ComfyUI. Fixes black image issues caused by numpy's lack of bfloat16 support. Includes FP32 VAE decode/encode and debug nodes for latent, conditioning, and model inspection. Useful for AMD Strix Halo, older NVIDIA cards, Apple Silicon, and unified memory systems.

custom_nodes.author: shootthesound
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-wan-i2v-control

custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that implements advanced document scanning with automatic perspective correction and multiple enhancement options.

custom_nodes.description: Extra nodes for LTX-2 video generation in ComfyUI.
